Name: BrainAccelerator
About the game: . BrainAccelerator is a multiplayer TPS. Customize your inventory uniquely and strategize to win. Utilize your Bullet Time and strategically pack your enemies!!! In BrainAccelerator, when a threat approaches a player, all players on the map enter Bullet Time. Dodge bullets and blasts, and run around the battlefield as you wish. Defeat the Champion! Players are free to enter battles at will. When you become a champion, your kill points, damage, score, and survival time will be added up and you will be registered in the ranking! Aim for the top ranking! For more information, plans, and announcements about the game's development, join our Discord now! Discord is here!
